#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int fi(int n) 
     { 
       int result = n; 
       for(int i=2;i*i <= n;i++) 
       { 
         if (n % i == 0) result -= result / i; 
         while (n % i == 0) n /= i; 
       } 
       if (n > 1) result -= result / n; 
       return result; 
     } 
	
int main()
{
	int t,n,ans;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		cout<<fi(n)<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
